options.c: Treated as an expense in Profit & Loss
options.d: Added to the cost of the underlying asset

questions.question: Based on the accounting guidance notes for futures, at the balance sheet date, how should the balance in the "Initial Margin - Equity Index/ Equity Stock Futures Account" be presented?

options.c: As a separate item under 'Currency Assets'

questions.question: For accounting of open interests in futures at the balance sheet date, if there is a net amount received (credit balance) in the "Mark-to-Market Margin Account," how should it be treated according to the prudence principle?
In the books of the buyer/holder of a cash-settled equity index option, how is the premium treated at the time of final settlement?

options.b: Recognized as an expense in the profit and loss account

questions.question: When accounting for open options at the balance sheet date in the books of the buyer/holder, a provision should be made if:

options.a: The premium prevailing on the balance sheet date is higher than the premium paid
options.b: The premium paid exceeds the premium prevailing on the balance sheet date

questions.question: For Foreign Portfolio Investors (FPIs), gains or losses from derivatives transactions on a recognized stock exchange are taxable under which head?

options.a: Profits and Gains from Business or Profession

questions.question: According to the sources, why were derivative transactions considered speculative transactions for income tax purposes prior to Financial Year 2005–06?

options.a: They were not traded on recognized exchanges
options.b: Section 43(5) defined them as settled otherwise than by actual delivery
options.c: STT was not applicable to them

questions.question: Under current tax provisions for Indian investors, if a loss on derivative transactions (non-speculative) cannot be set off against other income during the year (except salary), how can it be treated?

options.a: It is lost and cannot be carried forward
options.b: It can be carried forward for 8 assessment years and set off against any non-speculative business income
options.c: It can be carried forward indefinitely and set off against any income
options.d: It is set off against capital gains only

questions.question: For STT calculation on the sale of an option in securities where the option is exercised, what is the value of the taxable securities transaction?

options.d: The difference between settlement price and strike price

questions.question: According to the sources, who is responsible for deciding the framework for increasing customer satisfaction in the financial sector?

options.b: No investment is risk-free, and returns are related to risk

options.b: The desired return on an investment vehicle
